english.segment1: The wisest words I ever heard. Came with a gentle wind. Though it didnt hit me then. It made no sound. Til no one was around. This it blew me to my knees. And handed me the keys
english.segment2: Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it. Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it
english.segment3: I know the truth. I can show it to you. Or anybody else. But cant apply it to myself. I already know which way to go. If I stop and breathe the air. The answer is right there
english.segment4: Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it. Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it
english.segment5: You can fight. You can try with all your might. It may be the hardest thing. But its the only way to peace
english.segment6: Close your eyes. Count to ten. Take a deep breath and try again
english.segment7: You have access. By one Spirit (Ephesians 2:18)
english.segment8: Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it. Go, just go where the peace is. You always know if you seek it
